content.question: <math alttext="the limit as x approaches 0, of, the fraction with numerator cosine x, plus, 3 times, e to the x power, and denominator 2 times, e to the x power, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><munder><mrow><mi>lim</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></munder><mfrac><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> is

topic.text: 1.5: Determining Limits Using Algebraic Properties of Limits

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
